thread.title: Mr a Kleovoulou
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Mr a Kleovoulou

author: Mr a Kleovoulou
title: Mr a Kleovoulou
text:
Fantastic jacket much more stylish than Canada goose and just as warm.
I bought a Higgins for my son and a cartel for myself and have now bought the carla for my daughter. I hardly ever wear my Canada goose now as I prefer the subtle urban style of nobis.
When I was in Amsterdam I noticed they are very popular there.
Fits a bit small and it would have benefitted from an inside pocket and a double zip.
Otherwise perfect.
